title: 'We love 'gagging' the children' with art - U.S. DJ Seth Troxler and artist Scooter LaForge
text:
'We love 'gagging' the children' with art - U.S. DJ Seth Troxler and artist Scooter LaForge 2:39pm EDT - 01:25 
American creative duo brings LaForge's 'The Odyssey' art exhibition to London, hoping to 'gag' or 'wow' the public. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
